SEARCH
Package arimaa.core

Class Board

java.lang.Object
arimaa.core.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the Arimaa game board. It provides methods for placing pieces, making moves, and so much more. checking for valid moves, and determining win/lose conditions.

  • Method Details

    • placePiece

      public void placePiece(Piece piece, Position position)
      Method to place a piece onto the board.
      Parameters:
      piece - Piece object to be placed.
      position - Position object determining where piece should be placed on the board.

    • getPieceAt

      public Piece getPieceAt(Position position)
      Method to get what's stored at specific position on the board.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object determining the lookup position.
      Returns:
      Piece object if there is a piece is placed on the board at the position, else null value.

    • removePieceAt

      public void removePieceAt(Position position)
      Method to remove a piece from the board (by setting that position to null).
      Parameters:
      position - Position object determining coordinates of deletion.

    • isValidPosition

      public boolean isValidPosition(Position position)
      Method to determine whether given position is withing board range. (row 0-7, column 0-7)
      Parameters:
      position - Position object determining the checkup value.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(Move move)
      Method to move a piece on the board, given a Move object.
      Parameters:
      move - The Move object representing the move to make (can be given in child classes: StepMove, PushMove, PullMove)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the move is invalid or illegal.

    • emptyBoard

      public void emptyBoard()
      Method to empty the board (set all positions to null)

    • hasPlayerWon

      public Boolean hasPlayerWon(Player player, Player enemy)
      Method to check whether a player has already won. 1. Player's rabbit is in the goal row. 2. Enemy lost all of their rabbits.
      Parameters:
      player - Player object with the player for which we'd like to run a check.
      Returns:
      Boolean value whether this player has won.

    • populateBoardFrom2DString

      public void populateBoardFrom2DString(String[][] board2DString, Player player1, Player player2)
      Method to populate the board given a String[][] of Arimaa pieces denoted by notation. Example. "" will insert null object into the board. "M" will insert a gold (player's 1 camel into the board).
      Parameters:
      board2DString - String[][] object with empty string or 1-letter strings from [EeMmHhDdCcRr].
      player1 - Player object representing the first player (uppercase, starts in the 7-8th row, heads to the 1st row).
      player2 - Player object representing the second player (lowercase, starts in the 1-2th row, heads to the 8th row).

    • switchPieces

      public void switchPieces(Position position1, Position position2)
      Method to switch pieces on the board given two positions. Used before the game for the player's to arrange their starting positions.
      Parameters:
      position1 - Position object determining the location of the first piece on the board.
      position2 - Position object determining the location of the second piece on the board.

    • getPositionsOfPlayersPieces

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfPlayersPieces(Player player)
      Method to get position's of all pieces belonging to one player being currently on the board.
      Parameters:
      player - Player object whose pieces are searched for.
      Returns:
      ArrayList Positions of player's pieces.

    • isFriendlyPieceNearby

      public boolean isFriendlyPieceNearby(Position position)
      Method to check whether there is a friendly piece in a valid adjacent position. Used for unfreezing pieces and going over traps.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object for the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • getPositionsOfStrongerAdjacentEnemyPieces

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfStrongerAdjacentEnemyPieces(Position position)
      Method to get all stronger enemy pieces for all valid adjacent positions to the one examined. Used for freezing, pulling and pushing pieces.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • isStrongerEnemyPieceNearby

      public boolean isStrongerEnemyPieceNearby(Position position)
      Method to check whether there is a stronger enemy piece in a valid adjacent position. Used for unfreezing pieces.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • isPositionFrozen

      public boolean isPositionFrozen(Position position)
      Method to check whether there is a piece being on a given position is frozen. Used for denying a piece the right to move.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • isPositionEmpty

      public boolean isPositionEmpty(Position position)
      Method to check whether given position on the board is null (there is currently no piece at that position). Used for checking whether a piece can move around.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • getValidStepMovesByItselfForPosition

      public ArrayList<StepMove> getValidStepMovesByItselfForPosition(Position position)
      Method to get all valid Step Moves for the current position, when the move is done by the player owning the piece. Used for determining where the owner of the piece can step move this piece.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      ArrayList Legal step moves from the current position.

    • getValidStepMovesByPushingPullingForPosition

      public ArrayList<StepMove> getValidStepMovesByPushingPullingForPosition(Position position)
      Method to get all valid Step Moves for the current position, when the move is done by the enemy (pushing/pulling). Used for determining, where the enemy can push/pull this piece.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      ArrayList Legal step moves from the current position.

    • canStepMove

      public boolean canStepMove(Position position)
      Method to determine whether piece at this position has the capacity to move.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • canBeMoved

      public boolean canBeMoved(Position position)
      Method to determine whether piece at this position has the capacity to be moved.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • getPositionsOfPlayersPiecesWhichCanStepMove

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfPlayersPiecesWhichCanStepMove(Player player)
      Method to determine positions of pieces able to step move by itself.
      Parameters:
      player - Player object of the player owning the piece.
      Returns:
      ArrayList Positions of pieces able to step move.

    • getPositionsOfPlayersPiecesWhichCanBeMoved

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfPlayersPiecesWhichCanBeMoved(Player player)
      Method to determine positions of pieces, which can be moved (as they have adjacent space around them).
      Parameters:
      player - Player object of the player owning the piece.
      Returns:
      ArrayList Positions of pieces able to be moved.

    • canBePulled

      public boolean canBePulled(Position position)
      Method to check whether a piece at a given position can be pulled. Meaning this piece is adjacent to a stronger enemy piece, and this enemy piece can step move.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • getPositionsOfEnemyPiecesWhichCanBePulled

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfEnemyPiecesWhichCanBePulled(Player player, Player enemy)
      Method to determine candidates for pulled pieces.
      Parameters:
      player - Player object player considering the pull move.
      enemy - Player object enemy owning a piece that could be pulled.
      Returns:
      ArrayList positions of all the enemy pieces which can be pulled.

    • getPositionsOfPossiblePullingPieces

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfPossiblePullingPieces(Position pulledPiecePosition)
      Method to determine candidates for pulling pieces, given a position of chosen pulled piece.
      Parameters:
      pulledPiecePosition - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • getValidPullMovesForPullerAndPulled

      public ArrayList<PullMove> getValidPullMovesForPullerAndPulled(Position pullingPiecePosition, Position pulledPiecePosition)
      Method to determine final possible pull moves given enemy piece position and stronger friendly piece position.
      Parameters:
      pullingPiecePosition - position from getPositionsOfPossiblePullingPieces(pulledPiecePosition)
      pulledPiecePosition - position from getPositionsOfEnemyPiecesWhichCanBePulled(enemy)
      Returns:
      ArrayList list of possible pull moves

    • canBePushed

      public boolean canBePushed(Position position)
      Method to check whether a piece at a given position can be pushed. Meaning this piece can be moved and is adjacent to a stronger enemy piece.
      Parameters:
      position - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • getPositionsOfEnemyPiecesThatCanBePushed

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfEnemyPiecesThatCanBePushed(Player player, Player enemy)
      Method to determine candidates for pushed pieces.
      Parameters:
      player - Player object player considering the push move.
      enemy - Player object enemy owning a piece that could be pushed.
      Returns:
      ArrayList positions of all the enemy pieces which can be pushed.

    • getPositionsOfPossiblePushingPieces

      public ArrayList<Position> getPositionsOfPossiblePushingPieces(Position pushedPiecePosition)
      Method to determine candidates for pushing pieces, given a position of chosen pushed piece.
      Parameters:
      pushedPiecePosition - Position object of the examined position.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of the check.

    • getValidPushMovesForPusherAndPushed

      public ArrayList<PushMove> getValidPushMovesForPusherAndPushed(Position pushingPiecePosition, Position pushedPiecePosition)
      Method to determine final possible push moves given enemy piece position and stronger friendly piece position.
      Parameters:
      pushingPiecePosition - position from getPositionsOfPossiblePushingPieces(pushedPiecePosition)
      pushedPiecePosition - position from getPositionsOfEnemyPiecesWhichCanBePushed(enemy)
      Returns:
      ArrayList list of possible push moves
